job.title: Software Engineer
job.description:
Are you someone who connects the unconnectable? Pioneers new technology and innovation tech with modern thinking? Do you have a copy of CODE COMPLETE book written by Steve McConnell next to your night stand? Then keep reading because our
Software Developer
position could be just the role for you!
*
Job in a nutshell:
Develop software to integrate with internal back-end systems.
Snapshot of what else you will do:
Analyze information to determine, recommend, and plan installation of a new system or modification of an existing system
Analyze software requirements to determine feasibility
Confer with business analyst to design systems and to obtain information on project limitations and capabilities, performance requirements and interfaces
Implement integrations between software
Deploy updates and fixes
Investigate and resolve technical issues
Develop procedures and tools to reduce occurrences of errors and improve customer experience
Document integrations and flows
As a small growing business you will help in these areas:
Provide level 2 technical support
Assess server setup and usage
Modify software programs to improve performance
Improve automation
Monitor and improve networks and servers
What we are looking for:
BS in Computer Science, Information technology or related field required. Equivalent work experience and education in lieu of a degree will be considered
4 years Software Development/Engineering or relevant work experience required
Experience in JavaScript, PHP and cloud based infrastructure (AWS strongly desired)
Working knowledge of databases and MySQL
Strong curiosity and problem-solving attitude
Self-motivated, accountable, and team mentality
Knowledge of Laravel, Livewire, Tailwind and Salesforce a plus
Who we are:
At
Pattern
, we have a passion for helping doctors. We believe, as doctors and our team make better decisions, lives are changed.
Tech plays a major role in helping our team’s success and serving our clients.
At
Pattern
, we have a Fun-fessional culture. Don’t let the Fun fool you. We are growing fast and have big goals! We perform at a high level and like having fun together while doing it.
Still interested?
GREAT! APPLY NOW
, we would love to learn more about you!
